alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 1:43PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Benton, northwestern Madison, west central Carroll and northeastern Washington Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 142 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Fayetteville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Farmington... Elkins... West Fork... Greenland... Hindsville... Withrow Springs State Park... War Eagle... Drake Field Airport... Forum... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... Johnson... Goshen... Tuttle... Mayfield... Best... Lookout... Sonora... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 57 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
